author: nimrodyo
content:
Hi mates,
Trying to understand  why do I need to upload the "deposit_data" file generated by the "staking-deposit-cli", according to the code the "deposit_data" file contains my secret creds  for the staked ETHs.

author: pietjepuk
content: it does not contain any secret stuff

author: pietjepuk
content: It contains your public key, your withdrawal credentials (or address), i.e. all information that needs to be processed publicly by the deposit contract and the beacon chain.
